title: Delhi peak winter demand at record high as mercury dips
description: Data from the State Load Dispatch Centre showed peak demand at 5,701 MW at 10:50 AM on Friday, breaking the previous record on Wednesday of 5,611 MW. Peak power demand during winter months till last year was 5526 MW, recorded on January 6.  Tata Power Delhi Distribution Ltd (Tata Power DDL) said it met the all-time highest winter peak power demand for its service at 1,774 MW on Friday.
